vote.title: Authorize a cooperative purchasing agreement for professional services to support the enterprise capital project management system upgrade for the Department of Information and Technology Services with eCIFM SOLUTIONS INC through the General Service Administration Cooperative Purchase Agreement - Not to exceed $355,680.96 - Financing: Data Services Fund ($225,095.96) and Water Construction Fund ($130,585.00)
